Line 31: Line 31:
==13 January Bouterfif suicide==
==13 January Bouterfif suicide==
  +
[[image:Mohsen Bouterfif.jpg|thumb|175px|''Mohsen Bouterfif'' shown in the hospital after his [[self-immolation]].]]
On January 13, [[Mohsen Bouterfif]] set himself on fire after a meeting with the mayor of [[Boukhadra]] in Tebessa who was unable to offer Bouterfif a job and a house. Bouterfif eventually died a few days later and about 100 youths protested his death causing the provincial governor to sack the mayor. Three other attempted suicides were reported that week.<ref name="bouterfif_aljaz">{{cite web|url=http://english.aljazeera.net/news/africa/2011/01/20111162363063915.html|title=Algerian dies from self-immolation}}</ref> [[Al Jazeera]] described the suicide as "echoing the self-immolation that triggered the protests that toppled the leader of neighbouring Tunisia."<ref name="bouterfif_aljaz" />
On January 13, [[Mohsen Bouterfif]] set himself on fire after a meeting with the mayor of [[Boukhadra]] in Tebessa who was unable to offer Bouterfif a job and a house. Bouterfif eventually died a few days later and about 100 youths protested his death causing the provincial governor to sack the mayor. Three other attempted suicides were reported that week.<ref name="bouterfif_aljaz">{{cite web|url=http://english.aljazeera.net/news/africa/2011/01/20111162363063915.html|title=Algerian dies from self-immolation}}</ref> [[Al Jazeera]] described the suicide as "echoing the self-immolation that triggered the protests that toppled the leader of neighbouring Tunisia."<ref name="bouterfif_aljaz" />
